profile.description: I’m Julien, a full-stack developer passionate about coding since I was 15. Graduated from EPITA (2024), I build modern apps with React, Vue.js, Node.js, and Django. I’ve created a pipeline editor, an eco-friendly B2C app, an intranet, and I’m now developing an e-commerce platform. Sports taught me discipline and perseverance, values I apply to my projects. Always eager for new technical challenges, I’m ready to collaborate!

items.title: Business Analyst
items.description: Collaborated with external business stakeholders (iPension end users) to understand their needs and existing processes. Analyzed the legacy application (iPension 1st), investigated bugs related to the PC theme, and continuously optimized workflows. Authored detailed functional specifications for new features. Designed and monitored functionalities simplifying the management of complementary benefits files while ensuring compliance with legal requirements. Streamlined and improved existing processes.

items.title: Fullstack Developer - Final Internship
items.description: Developed an energy consumption tracking module for a client portal using Drupal and TailwindCSS, integrating usage pattern analysis and optimization suggestions. In collaboration with product teams, designed ergonomic interfaces, enhancing the experience for over 14,000 clients.

items.title: Fullstack Developer - Internship
items.description: Developed the internal CRM: implemented new features, fixed bugs, optimized performance, and improved error handling. Introduced safeguards to secure and stabilize the application. Backend built with Python (Flask). Contributed to improving the reliability and efficiency of the internal CRM.

items.title: Portfolio
items.description: Modern and responsive portfolio website developed with React and TypeScript. Showcasing my projects, skills and journey with an elegant interface using Tailwind CSS and smooth animations with Framer Motion. Integration of a contact system with a secure Express backend.

items.title: CHUV Schedule Digitizer
items.description: Web application dedicated to CHUV employees to transform paper schedules into digital .ics files. Allows creating a blank table, manually filling schedule codes (J, N, X...), and exporting the calendar. Multilingual interface with local storage.

items.title: API Factory - Insurance Management
items.description: RESTful API for managing clients and contracts of an insurance company, developed with Spring Boot. Complete implementation with soft delete, robust validation, globalized error handling and modular architecture. H2 database with seeding support for tests.

items.title: Bomberman - JWS 2024
items.description: Bomberman game implementation in Java for the JWS 2024 project. Development of a multiplayer game with bomb management, block destructibility, power-up system and complete game mechanics.
